button.detail.description: Button text used to view the recommended history details of the website.

button.withdrawal.description: Button text used to withdraw the recommended earnings of the website.

button.query.description: Button text used to query the recommended earnings of the website.

field.id.description: Unique identifier for the referral, referral refers to the recommended service of the API website.

field.percentage.description: Percentage of referral earnings calculated based on the order amount.

field.price.description: Order amount used to calculate referral earnings.

field.reward.description: Referral earnings calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

field.createdAt.description: Date when the referral was created.

field.level.description: Referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

field.threshold.description: Threshold for referral earnings used to withdraw referral earnings.

field.inviteeId.description: Unique identifier for the inviter, inviter refers to the one who invites invitees to the API website.

field.isVerified.description: Flag indicating whether the recommended user has been verified with real information.

message.deltaPriceForNextLevel.description: Difference between the current order amount and the next level threshold.

message.developingWithDrawal.message: Please join Discord and consult support personnel to process the withdrawal, and relevant income tax will be deducted during withdrawal.
message.developingWithDrawal.description: Message indicating that the withdrawal feature is under development.

message.technicalDetail.description: Technical implementation details of the referral system.

message.distributionQrDescription.message: Referral QR Code (Same as link content)
message.distributionQrDescription.description: Description of the referral QR code.

message.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as downstream customers.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: Message indicating the successful update of the referral information.

message.distributionLinkDescription.message: If a customer registers on this platform through this link or QR code, the customer will be permanently bound as your downstream customer, and all customer consumption orders on this platform will be refunded to your account according to the current distribution ratio.

message.distributionLinkDescription2.message: This link contains your user ID. After the customer opens the link, your user ID will be recorded in the customer's browser in the form of Cookies for seven days. Within seven days, if the customer registers on this platform by scanning this code, your user ID will be uploaded to the registration server together with Cookies, and the customer can be bound as your downstream customer.

title.price.description: Total amount of the referral order used to calculate referral earnings.

title.reward.description: Total referral reward calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

title.level.description: Referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.percentage.description: Referral earnings percentage used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentLevel.description: Current referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextLevel.description: Next referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentPercentage.description: Current referral earnings percentage used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextPercentage.description: Referral earnings percentage for the next level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.levelInfo.description: Information about the referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as downstream customers.

title.inviteesCount.description: Total number of inviters used to calculate referral earnings.
